es.selectTokenCategoryDescription1: Here you will find a selection of example tokens, divided into different categories. Choose a category from the dropdown menu to display the tokens in that category.
es.selectTokenCategoryDescription2: The tokens are located in the Foundry VTT file structure at:
es.selectTokenCategoryDescription3: From there, you can select some tokens for your characters, NPCs, and other game content.
es.selectSceneCategoryDescription1: Here you will find a selection of example scenes, divided into different categories. Choose a category from the dropdown menu to display the corresponding scenes.
es.selectSceneCategoryDescription2: The images for the scenes are located in the Foundry VTT file structure at:
es.selectSceneCategoryDescription3: To import, go to the "ecosquirrel-free-scenes" compendium in Foundry VTT and import the scenes via right-click.
es.selectSceneCategoryDescription4: Each scene was created with background music, 2–3 local audio files, some tokens that match the scene, and 1–2 short stories stored in the journal. Generic skill checks for your players are defined at appropriate points.
